author: billh
msg: Changed index2.svg to use larger filter bounds for blur filter.
This allows complete filtering of underlined text, which otherwise
has some painting outside geometric bounds.

author: billh
msg: Changed some calls to java.awt.Shape.getBounds() to getBounds2D(),
so that Rectangle2D instead of (integer-rounded) Rectangle is used.

author: billh
msg: Fix for bug with text/filter bounds when
applying filters to text if xml:space="preserve".

author: deweese
msg: 2) Initial cut at Convolve classes (still need work), but interface is set.
